If you wish to select a sub-view that is deep in the hierarchy you may have to click several times to select it; each successive click "drills down" one level into the hierarchy of the previously selected view. When you have selected a view, it will be highlighted with six square "handles". You can grab these with the mouse to resize the view. If you wish to reposition a view, you can click and drag it with the left mouse button; in this case the cursor changes to a NSEW arrow.
